department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for individual, cold-boxed meals for the Aircrew of 443 (Maritime Helicopter) Squadron.
description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for individual, cold-boxed meals for the Aircrew of 443 (Maritime Helicopter) Squadron, on an as and when requested basis.
